overview: The leader and villain of the movie is called Kadena, a buxom girl, who is the real deal of the gang "Hell's Angels" and whose goal is to kill the Mil Mascaras as sending to jail to his sweetheart consented. What force our hero to golpisar to bad and bad.
tagline: The Masked Marauder Champion Of Good Faces His Greatest Challenge When He Battles The Ruthless Gang Of The Infernal Angels
title: Los canallas
